alert.note: Alert for Clinch (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clinch County through 730 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Du Pont, or 9 miles east of Lakeland. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Homerville and Du Pont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
